head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DRESSEL, ROSE V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DRESSEL, ROSE V.

block.p: DRESSEL-Rose V., age 87, of Marlboro, NJ, formerly of Bay Ridge, on June 29, 2000. Wife of Henry Francis Dressel, mother of Diana Fradella, grandmother of Henry, Camille Corderio, Anthony Michael; great grandmother of Juliana Cordeiro. Funeral services 9 A.M., Monday at the Freeman Manalapan - Marlboro Funeral Home, 344 Route 9 N, Manalapan, NJ, followed by a 10 AM funeral Mass at St. Gabriel's RC Church, Marlboro. Interment in Lutheran Cemetery, Maspeth, NY. Calling hours 2-4 & 7-9 PM Saturday and 26 PM Sunday at the funeral home.

Interment in Lutheran Cemetery, Maspeth, NY. Calling hours 2-4 & 7-9 PM Saturday and 26 PM Sunday at the funeral home.
